dlentry.dd: XSLT-Conref combines the conref attribute of DITA with an XSL transformation. It allows you to reuse DITA content, to import structured external data, and to generate dynamic textual and graphical content.
XSLT-GUI provides a graphical user interface within your XSLT script.
Conbat sets attribute default values to generate content that is defined in a schema. With Conbat, you can display properly specialized elements without adding a specific CSS or XSLT.
